title: Bodega La Petra
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant and winery in a natural rock cave which offers traditional in-house made meals from La Rioja, with locally-grown organic vegetables and only extra virgin olive oil. The menu includes vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options. No smoking.
